properties.areaDesc: New Madrid, MO; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 11:45AM CST until February 26 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Mississippi
River...Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Tiptonville
* from Thursday February 13 until Tuesday February 25.
* At 11 AM Monday the stage was 34.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 39.5 feet on Thursday February 20.
* Flood stage is 37.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Thursday February 13 and
continue to rise to near 39.5 feet by Thursday February 20.The
river will fall below flood stage by Tuesday February 25.
* At 39.0 feet...In Tennessee, water begins to go over Tiptonville
Ferry Road, Barr Road, and the farm land east of the Tiptonville
Ferry Road.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
